SELECT pi.id, pi.package_name, pi.create_by, pi.create_on, hpi.order_num FROM hospital_package_info hpi LEFT JOIN package_info pi ON pi.id = hpi.info_package_id WHERE hpi.delete_flag = 0 AND hpi.hospital_info_id = #{id}
